attributes.action: Remove VAT from all British made bicycles and cycling accessories, and reduce VAT on imported bicycles and cycling accessories.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
VAT should be removed from all British made bicycles and cycling accessories for the following reasons:

1) Promote british manufacturing - creating jobs.
2) Promote cycling which improves peoples health and fitness.
3) Promote cycling as it is environmentally friendly.

VAT should be reduced on imported goods for the 2nd reason above.

Improving fitness could reduce obesity and improve the health of many.  This will reduce the strain on the NHS.
